<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Black Powder Boost](/Feats.aspx?ID=3166) <actions string="Single Action or Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 112</row>

**Archetype** [Bullet Dancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=117) (Level 6)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a loaded firearm.

</column>

---

You fire your weapon as you jump, using the kickback to go farther. You [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) and discharge your firearm to add a +10-foot status bonus to the distance traveled. If you spend 2 actions for Black Powder Boost, you [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) instead.

**Special** An ability that allows you to High Jump or Long Jump as a single action (like the [Quick Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=825) skill feat) lets you use Black Powder Boost as a single action for those jumps as well.

<title level="2">Black Powder Boost leads to...</title>
[Black Powder Blaze](/Feats.aspx?ID=3237), [Reach for the Stars](/Feats.aspx?ID=3211)
name: Black Powder Boost
